name: RiskAdjustmenthierarchicalStatus
title: Risk Adjustment Hierarchical Status CodeSystem
description: Indicate whether hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category (CC), and if applied, whether the Condition Category (CC) is superseded.

concept.display: Hierarchies applied and Condition Category is superseded
concept.definition: Hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category (CC) and the Condition Category (CC) is superseded.

concept.display: Hierarchies applied and Condition Category is not superseded
concept.definition: Hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category (CC) and the Condition Category (CC) is not superseded.
Hierarchies were not applied to a Condition Category (CC).
Applying hierarchies to a Condition Category (CC) is not applicable.
